name: Plastic Water Bottles
description: Chemicals like BPA can leach from the plastic into the water, potentially disrupting hormones.

name: Non-stick Pans
description: Teflon coatings can release toxic fumes when overheated, which can cause flu-like symptoms.

name: Microwave Popcorn
description: The bags are often lined with chemicals that can break down into PFOA, a likely carcinogen.

name: Air Fresheners
description: Many air fresheners release volatile organic compounds (VOCs) that can cause respiratory problems.

name: Cleaning Products
description: Many common household cleaners contain chemicals that can cause skin and respiratory irritation.

name: Canned Food
description: Some cans are lined with a resin that contains BPA, which can leach into the food.
